Add new alignment object. Only strings with characters from the alphabet [ACGT] are guaranteed to provide correct results.

◆ align_all()

virtual StatusType claragenomics::cudaaligner::Aligner::align_all ( )
pure virtual

Launch CUDA accelerated alignment.

Perform alignment on all Alignment objects previously inserted. This is an async call, and returns before alignment is fully finished. To sync the alignments, refer to the sync_alignments() call; To

◆ sync_alignments()

virtual StatusType claragenomics::cudaaligner::Aligner::sync_alignments ( )
pure virtual

Waits for CUDA accelerated alignment to finish.

Blocking call that waits for all the alignments scheduled on the GPU to come to completion.
